remarks: Define the class of all undirected hypergraphs.  An undirected hypergraph is a pair of a set and a function into the powerset of this set (the empty set excluded).  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-Dec-2017.)
statement:
df-uhgra $p |- UHGrph = { <. v , e >. | e : dom e --> ( ~P v \ { (/) } ) } $.
$d e v $.
